name: METAGAL
overview: Help the young cyborg-girl Meta in her quest to rescue her creator Dr Ray and her sisters from the hands of General Creeper, the evil leader of a rogue army! Collect new powers in order to face the advanced levels, in this fun and furious game. Creeper turned Metagal's sisters into battle cyborgs so he could use their powers to rule the world! Meta must face her sisters, free them, and copy their abilities. She must fight for 8 stages of intense action, and prepare herself for the final confrontation against Creeper himself! Unique Features: - Classic jump and shoot style platformer. - 8 levels with unique environment,detailed design and different gimmick. - 30 Enemies types not including Boss - Defeat Gal No.# Boss and use their weapon. - Collect secret items to power up your character. - Soft death penalty with "Gear" system allows player to resolve their mistakes with less frustration. - Controller and Keyboard customize support. - Finish the game once and play as Boss Characters each come with their own power and upgrade!
